entry.title: Proper BTRFS root partition on Proxmox

link.title: Proper BTRFS root partition on Proxmox

entry.summary: Selecting BTRFS as the root filesystem during the Proxmox install, will give you exactly that–Proxmox installed in the root (/) volume of the btrfs partition. Being used to be able to choose my own volume / subvolume layout, I much prefer a tidier structure, where the rootfs is nested in a neat folder structure.
